<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/crm/settings"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sets the tenant settings specified in the request to the portal.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"configured":{"description":"Defines if the portal is configured or not","type":"array","items":{"type":"boolean"}},"webFormKey":{"description":"Website contact form key","type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The tenant setting for the portal configuration value (true or false)","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"boolean"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
